channel.title: Go on Jeongseup Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Go on Jeongseup Blog

item.title: CVMS (Cosmos Validator Monitoring Service)
item.description:
Role

Lead Developer

Description

An open-source monitoring tool designed for Cosmos-SDK validator nodes. It provides real-time metrics and alerts to ensure node stability and performance.

Tech Stack

  • Go
  • Prometheus
  • Grafana

item.title: [bnb-chain/[**greenfield-go-sdk**](https://github.com/bnb-chain/greenfield-go-sdk)] Add a feature
item.description:
Feature Description

Added support for sending multiple messages in a single transaction. This feature allows for batch operations, such as cancelling all failed objects in one go, significantly improving efficiency and reducing gas usage.

View on GitHub
